item.title: Aon Hewitt provides insights on Malaysia's perspective in the Total Compensation Measurement study
item.description: Aon Hewitt, a global human resource consulting firm, has published their Total Compensation Measurement (TCM) 2015 Study. This comprehensive report analyzes compensation data from 25,000 positions in 180 countries. Salary increase by industry sector in Malaysia While the global GDP is projected to grow from 3.1% in 2015 to 3.6% in 2016, regional economic conditions play a vital role in employee compensation decisions. In Southeast Asia, the Philippines and Vietnam led in 2015 with 6% and 6.
